item.title: SRCU state double scan
item.description: The SRCU flavor of RCU uses per-cpu counters to detect that every CPU has passed through a quiescent state for a particular SRCU lock instance (srcu_struct). There’s are total of 4 counters per-cpu. One pair for locks, and another for unlocks. You can think of the SRCU instance to be split into 2 parts. The readers sample srcu_idx and decided which part to use. Each part corresponds to one pair of lock and unlock counters.
